title: Anji Sophisticated Stay within Lingfeng National Scenic Area
description: Escape to the ethereal beauty of Lingfeng National Scenic Area, with a stay at the elegant Hotel Indigo Anji, an IHG Hotel. Hidden amongst the enchanting Lingfeng Mountains, the hotel boasts a minimalistic design, with a colour palette inspired by bamboo reeds and tea fields. Immerse yourself in the beauty of the natural surroundings before indulging in the lavish spa, mouthwatering dining options, elegant rooftop bar and soothing lagoon pool.
